name: Prometeo Innovations
description: PROMETEO Innovations was founded in Spain in 2007. The company's focus is summarized in the application of three parameters: Engineering, Innovation and Technology. They pursue the objective of offering a service, to provide value  to their clients,  stake-holders  and society in general. Whether you deal with vehicles, transportation or traffic, in health, education or care areas ( BASE option  in the menu), or in energy or industry solutions ( ICT area ), they can help you .
